description.value:
The following serums (Core Rulebook 225) were developed by osharus of the Verdant Spiral in Atuity but have found their way into specialty shops in the more populated areas of the galaxy.

A living creature who imbibes this serum develops a noticeable greenish tint to their skin, sometimes accompanied by temporary, leaflike protrusions. For the next week, the creature no longer requires food and gains the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.JN5UTMZRRC3B1xYu]{photosynthesis} ability of a ghoran (Alien Archive 2 57). For the duration of this effect, the creature is affected by spells and abilities as though they possess the plant type graft (Alien Archive 133).

Photosynthesis

Ghorans undergo photosynthesis to gain nutrition instead of eating (although they can eat if they so wish).

A ghoran can go without light (either sunlight or UV light, such as from starships) for 3 days, after which they must attempt Constitution checks to avoid @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#starvation-and-thirst]{starvation}.

Plant type graft

This type describes vegetable creatures. Note that regular plants, such as those growing in gardens or fields, lack Wisdom and Charisma modifiers and are objects, not creatures, even though they are alive.

Traits: Low-light vision, @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.universal-creature-rules.Cz8sIXkimFrcKyy9]{Plant Immunities (Ex)}.

Adjustments: +2 to Fortitude saving throws.

Serums

Serums are vials of magic liquid that you can imbibe as a standard action or carefully trickle down the throat of a helpless or unconscious creature as a full action. Serums are normally 1 ounce of liquid (though it is possible to make serums with larger volumes, these are no more effective than standard serums), and lose potency if they are mixed with any other material. A serum can be used only once. Regardless of a serumâ€™s actual item level, all serum vials have their hardness and Hit Points calculated as if they were 1st-level items.

modifiers.name: Chlorophyll Infusion Serum
modifiers.notes: For the duration of the Chlorophyll Infusion Serum's effect, the creature is affected by spells and abilities as though they possess the plant type graft.
